name: Fall Ball (Psychic Chair Games)
description:
*Made for Rowan University's 2020 ACM Game Jam*

Based on the theme: FALL

Fall Ball is a simple game where you are this ball, and you fall. Collect coins to buy new skins in the store and rack up points for the hiscore by falling for as long as you can. Avoid shards of glass and evil baddies! Hearts heal you 1 heart, and the x2 is a money multiplier!

Tips: 

  • The x2 Money Multiplier multiplies your multiplier by 2 (1 -> 2 -> 4 -> 8...)
  • You can overheal to 10 hearts.
